About Me

Engineer, Designer, & Product Developer

I'm a product developer with a technical mind & a flair for design. I'm an experienced team worker but enjoy digging deep in technical tasks independently. I have a few rotating hobbies which reflect my affinity for balancing technical and design aspects.

Get in touch on LinkedInOr shoot me an email

Interests

I have a few rotating hobbies which reflect my affinity for balancing technical and design aspects. I enjoy songwriting and music production, computer programming projects, and creative writing. And when I can find people to play with, I enjoy being a game master for games such as Dungeons & Dragons.
